page.title: 07A Typical Morning -by a Mam.
page.content: My day begins trying to get the children out of bed, if I start at 7am I know they will be downstairs by 8am. Breakfast is cereal and a hot drink and then there is a mad half hour when everything that is needed has grown legs and disappeared! The peace and quiet after they have gone to school is heaven. I have a quick snack of coffee and biscuits before cleaning the house. My system seems to work, I tidy and straighten the living room so if callers come we can sit in there and chat. I then clean the kitchen and pop the laundry in the washing machine where it can look after itself. I get my youngest son ready and go to town where I buy what is needed for that days meals. If time is on my side I go to the library to browse, hardback books are so expensive so borrowing them is a real pleasure for me.
